description:
AlmaLinux can now develop and apply security patches and bug fixes ahead of RHEL, because it no longer seeks to be a line-by-line exact copy of Red Hat's operating system.

The post In a First, AlmaLinux Patches a Security Hole That Remains Unpatched in Upstream RHEL appeared first on FOSS Force.
title: In a First, AlmaLinux Patches a Security Hole That Remains Unpatched in Upstream RHEL
